# CFStringEncoding

**Type Alias**

An integer type for constants used to specify supported string encodings in various CFString functions.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias CFStringEncoding = UInt32
```

## Discussion

This type is used to define the constants for the built-in encodings (see [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFStringBuiltInEncodings] for a list) and for platform-dependent encodings (see [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/external-string-encodings]). If CFString does not recognize or support the string encoding of a particular string, CFString functions will identify the string’s encoding as [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/kCFStringEncodingInvalidId].

## Data Types

- **CFStringEncodings**: Index type for constants used to specify external string encodings.
- **CFStringCompareFlags**: A [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFOptionFlags] type for specifying options for string comparison .
- **CFStringInlineBuffer**: Defines the buffer and related fields used for in-line buffer access of characters in CFString objects.
